mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sale (id, item_id, seller_id, barcode, expiration_date, is_bought, is_bought_date, created_date, updated_date, deleted_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{itemId}, #{sellerId}, #{barcode}, #{expirationDate}, #{isBought}, null, NOW(), NOW(), null)
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sale WHERE barcode = #{barcode})
SELECT id, item_id, seller_id, barcode, expiration_date, is_bought, is_bought_date, created_date FROM sale WHERE id = #{saleId} AND is_bought = 0 AND is_bought_date IS NULL

SELECT id, item_id, seller_id, barcode, expiration_date, is_bought, is_bought_date, created_date FROM sale WHERE item_id = #{itemId} AND is_bought = 0 AND is_bought_date IS NULL ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
